body_html:
Here is the attached log file. I rebuilt so that's why time is less, else it took 53 minutes last time for error to pop up. Anyways, what I do is:

(1) Set up Visual Studio 14 to be used as Generator:
cmake -G "Visual Studio 14 2015" /path_to_source

(2) Then I do
cmake --build build_32 --config Release

If I use "Visual Studio 14 2015 Win64", then it generates targets for Platform x64.

log.txt

body:
Here is the attached log file. I rebuilt so that's why time is less, else it took 53 minutes last time for error to pop up. Anyways, what I do is:

(1) Set up Visual Studio 14 to be used as Generator:
cmake -G "Visual Studio 14 2015" /path_to_source

(2) Then I do 
cmake --build build_32 --config Release

If I use "Visual Studio 14 2015 Win64", then it generates targets for Platform x64.

[log.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/846735/log.txt)
